accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.defaultMessage: You do not have permission to access this resource.
accessDenied.contactAdmin: Please contact your administrator if you believe you should have access.

dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome to the HybridAuth IdP Administration Interface

clients.title: OIDC Clients
clients.description: Manage OpenID Connect client applications that can authenticate with this IdP.

scopes.title: OIDC Scopes
scopes.description: Define scopes that control what information clients can access from user profiles.

users.title: Users
users.description: Manage user accounts, roles, and permissions for identity management.

users.pageSubtitle: Manage user accounts, roles, and permissions
users.search: Search users by email, name, or ID...
users.noUsers: No users found matching your criteria.
users.noPermission: You do not have permission to view users.

errors.saveFailed: Failed to save user. Please check the form for errors.
errors.unknownSaveFailed: An unknown error occurred while saving the user.

confirmations.deactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate user {email}?
confirmations.reactivate: Are you sure you want to reactivate user {email}?
confirmations.deleteWarning: Warning: This will permanently delete the user {email} and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
confirmations.deleteFinal: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete user {email}?

users.emailCannotBeChanged: Email cannot be changed after creation.
users.leaveBlankToKeepCurrent: Leave blank to keep current password.
users.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.

passwordErrors.minLength: Password must be at least {n} characters long.
passwordErrors.uppercase: Password must contain an uppercase letter.
passwordErrors.lowercase: Password must contain a lowercase letter.
passwordErrors.specialChar: Password must contain a special character.

loginHistory.title: Login History
loginHistory.empty: No login history found for this user.

confirm.approve: Are you sure you want to approve this login from IP {ip}? This will add the IP to the whitelist for this user.

alerts.approveSuccess: Login approved successfully. IP address added to whitelist.

roles.pageSubtitle: Manage roles and permissions for users

editModal.title: Edit Role
editModal.systemRoleInfo: This is a system role. The name cannot be changed, but you can modify its permissions.
editModal.systemRoleNameWarning: System role names cannot be changed

deleteModal.title: Delete Role
deleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete the role "{name}"?
deleteModal.systemRoleInfo: This is a system role and cannot be deleted. System roles are essential for the application's security model.
deleteModal.usersAssignedInfo: This role is currently assigned to {count} user(s). You cannot delete a role that has users assigned to it.
deleteModal.reassignWarning: Please reassign or remove these users from this role before deleting it.

persons.pageSubtitle: Manage person profiles and linked accounts
persons.search: Search by name, employee ID, or department...
persons.noPersons: No persons found matching your criteria.
persons.noPermission: You do not have permission to view persons.

validation.nationalIdRequired: National ID is required when document type is selected
validation.nationalIdFormat: Invalid National ID format (should be 1 letter + 9 digits)
validation.nationalIdChecksum: National ID checksum failed, please verify the number
validation.passportRequired: Passport number is required when document type is selected
validation.passportFormat: Invalid passport format (should be 6-12 alphanumeric characters)
validation.residentCertRequired: Resident certificate is required when document type is selected
validation.residentCertFormat: Invalid resident certificate format (should be 10-12 alphanumeric characters)
validation.onlyOneDocumentType: Please fill in only one document type

linkedAccounts.title: Linked Accounts
linkedAccounts.noAccounts: No accounts linked to this person.
linkedAccounts.searchUsers: Search users by email or username...
linkedAccounts.noAvailableUsers: No available users found. All users may already be linked.

errors.noUserSelected: Please select a user to link.

confirmations.unlink: Are you sure you want to unlink the account {email} from this person?

errors.noIdentityDocument: This person has no identity document to verify.

confirmations.delete: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This will unlink all associated accounts but will not delete the accounts themselves.
confirmations.verifyIdentity: Are you sure you want to verify the identity of {name}? This action will mark the identity document as verified.

scopes.title: Scope Management
scopes.name: Name
scopes.consentDisplayNameKeyHelp: Localization key for the scope display name shown on consent screen (e.g., 'scope.profile.display')
scopes.consentDescriptionKeyHelp: Localization key for the scope description shown on consent screen (e.g., 'scope.profile.description')
scopes.iconUrlHelp: Bootstrap icon class name (e.g., 'bi bi-person') or URL to icon image
scopes.categoryHelp: Group scopes by category for better organization
scopes.displayOrderHelp: Order in which scopes appear on consent screen (lower numbers first)

form.name: Name
form.nameHelp: Unique identifier for the scope (cannot be changed after creation)
form.resourcesPlaceholder: Enter resource identifiers, one per line
form.resourcesHelp: Optional resource server identifiers this scope is associated with
form.consentSectionHelp: Customize how this scope appears on the user consent screen
form.consentDisplayNameKeyHelp: Localization key for the scope display name shown on consent screen (e.g., 'scope.profile.display')
form.consentDescriptionKeyHelp: Localization key for the scope description shown on consent screen (e.g., 'scope.profile.description')
form.iconUrlHelp: Bootstrap icon class name (e.g., 'bi bi-person') or URL to icon image
form.categoryHelp: Group scopes by category for better organization
form.displayOrderHelp: Order in which scopes appear on consent screen (lower numbers first)
form.isRequiredHelp: Users cannot decline this scope - it will always be granted
form.userClaimsHelp: Select which user claims this scope includes

settings.brandingSectionDesc: Customize application branding and display names
settings.appNameHelp: Displayed in browser tab titles and admin interface
settings.productNameHelp: Displayed in page titles and branding
settings.confirmCancel: You have unsaved changes, are you sure you want to cancel?

deniedMessages.create: You do not have permission to create new items.

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address.

roleAssignment.title: Manage User Roles
roleAssignment.selectRoles: Select roles to assign to the user
roleAssignment.systemRoleTooltip: This is a system-managed role and cannot be removed.

sessions.title: Manage User Sessions
sessions.empty: No active sessions found for this user.

confirm.revokeOne: Are you sure you want to revoke this session?
confirm.revokeAll: Are you sure you want to revoke ALL sessions for this user? They will be logged out from all devices.

clients.pageSubtitle: Manage OpenID Connect clients for your identity provider
clients.searchPlaceholder: Search by Client ID or Display Name
clients.title: Client Management
clients.noClients: No clients found. Create your first OIDC client to get started.
clients.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this client?

actions.regenerateSecretConfirm: Are you sure you want to regenerate the secret for "{clientId}"? The old secret will stop working immediately.

form.applicationTypeNativeDesc: Desktop/mobile apps with custom URI schemes
form.clientTypePublicDesc: For SPAs, mobile apps, and desktop apps that cannot securely store secrets
form.clientTypeConfidentialDesc: For server-side apps that can securely store secrets (requires Client Secret)
form.consentTypeExplicitDesc: Requires user approval on every authorization (useful in testing)
form.consentTypeImplicitDesc: Remembers approval after first authorization (recommended for production)
form.consentTypeHelp: Controls authorization behavior: explicit creates temporary (AdHoc) authorizations requiring consent each time; implicit creates permanent authorizations that remember the user's choice.
form.clientSecretRequired: Client Secret is required for confidential clients
form.clientSecretNotAllowed: Public clients cannot have a Client Secret
form.redirectUrisRequired: At least one Redirect URI is required
form.redirectUrisInvalid: Redirect URI line {line} is not a valid absolute URL
form.postLogoutRedirectUrisInvalid: Post Logout URI line {line} is not a valid absolute URL
form.permissionsHelp: ðŸ’¡ Tip: Most OAuth/OIDC flows need at minimum: Authorization Endpoint, Token Endpoint, Authorization Code grant, and OpenID scope.
form.allowedScopesHelp: Select which scopes this client is allowed to request. This acts as a whitelist - the client can only receive tokens with these scopes.
form.allowedScopesRequired: At least one scope must be selected
form.allowedScopesOpenidRequired: OIDC clients must include the 'openid' scope
form.allowedScopesNone: No scopes available. Please create scopes first.
form.validationError: Please correct the validation errors below.

secretModal.title: Client Secret Generated
secretModal.message: The client secret has been generated successfully. This is the only time the secret will be displayed. Please copy and store it securely.

accessDenied.create: You do not have permission to create clients.
accessDenied.update: You do not have permission to update clients.
accessDenied.delete: You do not have permission to delete clients.

scopes.pageSubtitle: Manage OpenID Connect scopes for your identity provider
scopes.searchPlaceholder: Search by Scope Name or Display Name
scopes.title: Scope Management
scopes.noScopes: No scopes found. Create your first OIDC scope to get started.
scopes.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this scope?

form.name: Scope Name
form.nameHelp: Unique identifier for this scope (e.g., profile, email)
form.userClaimsNone: No claims available. Create claims first.
form.userClaimsHelp: Select which claims should be included when this scope is requested
form.consentSectionHelp: Customize how this scope appears on the user consent screen
form.consentDisplayNameHelp: Friendly name shown to users during consent (defaults to Display Name)
form.consentDescriptionPlaceholder: This allows the app to read your email address
form.consentDescriptionHelp: Detailed explanation of what this permission allows
form.iconUrlHelp: Bootstrap Icons class (e.g., 'bi bi-envelope') or URL to icon image
form.categoryHelp: Group scopes by category on consent screen
form.displayOrderHelp: Order in which this scope appears (lower numbers first)
form.isRequiredHelp: If checked, users cannot opt out of this scope during consent
form.validationError: Please correct the validation errors below.

accessDenied.create: You do not have permission to create scopes.
accessDenied.update: You do not have permission to update scopes.
accessDenied.delete: You do not have permission to delete scopes.

claims.pageSubtitle: Manage OIDC user claims that can be included in ID tokens and access tokens
claims.searchPlaceholder: Search name, display name, or description

emptyState.title: No claims
emptyState.message: Get started by creating a new claim.

form.name: Name
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Description of what this claim represents
form.claimTypeHelp: The JWT claim name that appears in tokens
form.standardNote: Standard OIDC claims have limited editing. Only display name and description can be modified.

claims.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the claim "{name}"?

security.pageSubtitle: Manage dynamic security policies for the identity provider
security.historyCountHelp: Prevents users from reusing recent passwords. 0 to disable.
security.expirationDaysHelp: Forces users to change their password after a set period. 0 to disable.
security.minAgeDaysHelp: Prevents users from changing their password too frequently. 0 to disable.
security.maxFailedAttemptsHelp: Number of failed attempts before an account is locked.
security.lockoutDurationHelp: How long an account remains locked after too many failed attempts.
security.abnormalLoginHistoryCountHelp: Number of recent logins to check for abnormal IP addresses.
security.blockAbnormalLoginHelp: Prevent login attempts from IP addresses not seen in recent history.

resources.pageSubtitle: Manage API resources and their associated scopes
resources.searchPlaceholder: Search by Resource Name or Display Name
resources.noResourcesMessage: No API resources found. Create your first API resource to get started.
resources.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this API resource? All scope associations will be removed.

form.name: Resource Name
form.nameHelp: Unique identifier for this API resource (e.g., company-api)
form.baseUrlHelp: Base URL of the API (for documentation purposes)
form.scopesHelp: Select which scopes belong to this API resource
form.noScopesAvailable: No scopes available. Create scopes first.

accessDenied.read: You do not have permission to view API resources.
accessDenied.create: You do not have permission to create API resources.
accessDenied.update: You do not have permission to update API resources.
accessDenied.delete: You do not have permission to delete API resources.
